with nlj.open(tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w'), 'w') as src:
    with pytest.raises(TypeError):
        src.write(tuple)
with nlj.open(tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='r+')) as src:
    src._stream.write('{')
    src._stream.seek(0)
    with pytest.raises((TypeError, ValueError)):
        next(src)
